title: Eaves Pacifica - On-site Laundry, Heated Pool, Pet Friendly
posting_body: ['Welcome to eaves Pacifica – located in San Mateo County – where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living.', 'We offer quality Pacifica apartments with a few little extras, like built in storage organizers and well-equipped kitchens featuring brand name appliances.', 'Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.', 'Simply put, our apartments in Pacifica offer more of what you hope for.', 'Better than you bargained for.', 'So, what are you waiting for?', 'Pacifica Apartments by eaves When you choose to live in Pacifica, you expect an apartment where you can live comfortably.', 'At eaves Pacifica, you will find exactly what you’re looking for.', 'Located on Gateway Drive, our Pacifica apartments put you just minutes from the beach, as well as great shopping and dining venues.', "Some of the local attractions you'll enjoy include the Coastside Farmer's Market, Fairmont Shopping Center and Rockaway Beach Plaza.", "There's also an abundance of local eateries to try like Mama Maria's Ristorante, American Sushi House and Ledu Restaurant.", 'Pacifica Apartment Community All your needs are met in order to ensure a comfortable lifestyle at eaves Pacifica.', 'This Pacifica apartment community offers residents a wide range of amenities including a pool and sundeck, fitness center, on-site laundry facilities and garden-style landscaping.', 'We will take care of any issues that arise, quickly and smoothly, allowing you to focus on the more important parts of your life.', 'Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Pacifica today.', 'Our staff.', 'Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment.', 'It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them.', 'Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community.', 'That’s eaves.', 'Our location.', 'We know you value convenience.', 'That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.', 'Our extras.', 'You made a promise to yourself to live within your means.', "That doesn't mean living without.", 'Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.', 'Furnished Available', 'Amenities:', 'Pet Friendly', 'On-site Laundry', 'Balcony/Patio (Select Homes)', 'Parking', 'Pool', 'Green Community', 'Green Apartment', 'High-Speed WiFi', 'Fitness Center', 'Furnished', 'Fully Equipped Kitchen', 'Package Acceptance', 'Walk-in Closets (Select Homes)', 'On-site Maintenance', 'Public Transportation', 'ADA Accessible (Select Homes)', 'Fireplace (Select Homes)', 'Roommate friendly floor plans', 'Flexible Living Option', 'Call:', 'show contact info']
